LanguageData.OE_CosmolHigh.label: cosmol effect
LanguageData.OE_CosmolHigh.description: Active cosmol immunostimulant in the bloodstream. Helps preventing infections before they take hold and fight against general bacterial infections.
LanguageData.OE_SlugolHigh.label: slugol effect
LanguageData.OE_SlugolHigh.description: Unique slugol compounds in the bloodstream. Slowly healing of wounds, removes scar tissue, boosting the metabolism and therefore the immune response.
LanguageData.OE_SevideHigh.label: sevide effect
LanguageData.OE_SevideHigh.description: Deadly poison sevide compounds in the bloodstream. Causes extreme convulsions, trouble breathing and eventual death.
LanguageData.OE_SevideHigh.stages.trembling.label: trembling
LanguageData.OE_SevideHigh.stages.convulsing.label: convulsing
LanguageData.OE_SevideHigh.stages.death.label: death
